name: Another Veggie Harvester Unit
description:
Another day, another harvest. You're controlling a basket (Harvester Unit) that can analyze items and translate them for you.

Now it seems you've landed on a farm and you wonder what will you learn today.

Controls
  • (arrow keys) = Move
  • SPACE = Brake
  • R = Respawn
  • M/N = Mute (Music/Sound)
  • B = Add time (till the end of game)
Credits

This game was made in 2 full days for a gamejam (Ludum Dare 52). It wouldn't be possible as fast without people providing free licensed assets and info. So I thank you.

(Texture) Muddy ground, by ForKotLow under CC0 license.
(Texture) Wood, by Matt Bango under CC0 license.
(Image) Vegtables, by macrovector (Freepik) under custom license.
(Text/Data) Translations (partial), by Frederic Bibard under custom license.
(Font) Honey Silk, by Khurasan under DAFONT100 license.
(Font) Indie Flower, by Kimberly Geswein under SIL-OFL license.
(Music) Daylight, by Aerocity under CC-BY license.
